summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Massachusetts Street from Lakeside Avenue South to 32nd Avenue South, and certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 15818 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
